FuncDef: The display vpn-group command displays information about a VPN group.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a VPN group.
The name is a string of 1 to 31 characters and case sensitive.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
You can run the display vpn-group command to check the configuration of a VPN group. If no parameter is specified, information about all VPN groups is displayed.
